action.action-desc: Ms. Tokuda (for herself and Mr. Case) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the provision of direct housing loans and medical care from the Department of Veterans Affairs for Native Hawaiians.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Parity for Native Hawaiian Veterans Act of 2025.

section.header: Modification to program for direct housing loans made to Native American veterans by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 3765(3)(B) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking as that term and all that follows through 42 Stat. 108) and inserting as defined in section 801 of the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 (25 U.S.C. 4221).

section.header: Improvement of provision of medical care from Department of Veterans Affairs for Native Hawaiians

subsection.header: Reimbursement of costs of certain care provided through Native Hawaiian health care system

paragraph.text: Subchapter I of chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 1703G the following new section:

section.header: Reimbursement of costs of certain care provided through Native Hawaiian health care system

subsection.text: The Secretary shall reimburse a Native Hawaiian health care system for the costs of care or services provided through such system to veterans eligible for such care or services under the laws administered by the Secretary, regardless of whether such care or services are provided directly through such system, through purchased or referred care, or through a contract for travel.

subsection.header: Native Hawaiian health care system defined
subsection.text: The term Native Hawaiian health care system has the meaning given that term in section 12 of the Native Hawaiian Health Care Improvement Act (42 U.S.C. 11711).

paragraph.text: The table of sections at the beginning of such chapter is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 1703G the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: 1703H. Reimbursement of costs of certain care provided through Native Hawaiian health care system.
